蟠尾絲蟲.definition: Onchocerca volvulus, the filarial parasite worm causing "river blindness" or onchocerciasis, the second most common cause of blindness in humans

蟠尾絲蟲症.definition: "river blindness" or onchocerciasis, the second most common cause of blindness in humans, caused by the filarial parasite worm Onchocerca volvulus

蟠據.definition: variant of 盤踞|盘踞[pan2 ju4]

蟠曲.definition: variant of 盤曲|盘曲[pan2 qu1]

蟠根錯節.definition: variant of 盤根錯節|盘根错节[pan2 gen1 cuo4 jie2]

蟠桃.definition: flat peach (aka Saturn peach or donut peach); the peaches of immortality kept by Xi Wangmu 西王母

蟠踞.definition: variant of 盤踞|盘踞[pan2 ju4]
